title: Nineteen Lincolns
description: portrait of two men dressed as President Lincolns; older man has white beard and stands with his PL hand on PL shoulder of much younger man who is seated in front of him; younger man wears braces on teeth; blurry line of trees and blue sky in distance; blurry tree branches in URQ; framed behind glass in black wood frame; one of a set of 18 photographs to be displayed together
creditline: The Shirley Mahowald and Henry Kinsell Endowment for Art Acquisition
